mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer_agent_relations c WHERE c.agent_id = #{agentId} AND c.status = 2 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}
SELECT count(o.id) as count FROM customer_agent_relations o where o.agent_id = #{agentId}
SELECT c.id,c.username,c.name,c.phone,c.email FROM customers c WHERE c.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers(name, username, password,created_at,status) VALUES(#{name}, #{username}, #{password},now(),2)
INSERT INTO customer_agent_relations(customer_id, agent_id, created_at) VALUES(#{customer_id}, #{agent_id}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customers c WHERE c.username = #{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE customers c SET c.status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
